function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases due to individualistic societies and unsustainable consumption patterns","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread and difficulty in controlling outbreaks","Mitigation":"Promote a sense of mutual care for common goods and collaboration, and encourage sustainable consumption patterns","Technologies":"Social campaigns, educational programs","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, NGOs, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Detachment of people from the biosphere leading to difficulty in caring for nature","Impact":"Decreased incentive to care for nature, leading to environmental degradation and increased disease risks","Mitigation":"Promote nature-centered education and awareness programs, emphasize the importance of a healthy biosphere","Technologies":"Educational tools, community engagement platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Environmental organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Shift in worldview from technological utopia to dependence on ecosystems","Impact":"Limited understanding of the interdependence of human and natural systems, leading to increased vulnerability to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Promote ethics of land integrity, minimal ownership, and nature-centered education","Technologies":"Educational tools, advocacy platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Educational institutions, advocacy groups"}]}
